posts.post_content:
Posted By: Kevin Cummings
Nice looking card of Mike Goodfellow. Tougher Detroit version. Some light glue residue on the reverse.

Although I really prefer to trade for a similar conditioned N172, I will consider a cash offer if it is attractive enough.

[IMG]http://www.network54.com/Realm/tmp/1238078834.JPG[/IMG] [IMG]http://www.network54.com/Realm/tmp/1238078853.JPG[/IMG]

Posted By: Sean
Hi Kevin,

I assume the Goodfellow is too nice to trade for what I have but was wondering if you have any lesser condition ones you are looking to trade for one of my Shorty Radfords I have posted a few threads down.

Thanks
sean [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/happy.gif[/IMG]

Posted By: Kevin Cummings
Sean:

Thanks for the reply, but Radford is not someone for whom I'm looking and, at the moment, Goodfellow is my only trade bait.

Kevin

Posted By: joe
What kind of cash offer are you looking for?


email JMAPLES0871@CHARTER.NET

Joe


Ty Cobb, Spikes flying!

Posted By: Kevin Cummings
Joe:

I'd much rather check a card off my want list than to get a check in the mail, so as a result I haven't given much thought to a firm "for sale" figure.

But like Potter Stewart said about pornography "...it's hard to define, but I'll know it when I see it..." [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/wink.gif[/IMG]

Kevin

Posted By: bigfish
Kevin,

E-mail sent.  Can you clarify the last statement in the post above?  It might help me find something on your list.  

Toby

Posted By: Bruce Kasarda
Kevin, can I get a scan of Potter Stewart please. Thanks Bruce K

Posted By: boxingcardman
Has anyone offered a Johnson for the Goodfellow yet? [One old English slang definition of goodfellow was "vigorous fornicator"]  

Sic Gorgiamus Allos Subjectatos Nunc

Posted By: Kevin Cummings
Adam:

This posting and my emails last night are testimony to the fact that one should not drink Jack Daniels, watch the Sweet Sixteen and traipse around on the Internet simultaneously.

And while no one has yet, I am hoping someone will eventually offer me a Johnson - Spud Johnson. I'd take it! [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/happy.gif[/IMG]

Kevin

Posted By: bigfish
Nice pic.  That is not a type 1 photo so Brucie and I would pass.  Put that back in your scrapbook.  No glue...you will ruin the photo......

Posted By: Bruce Kasarda
Kevin, I'll pass on the Stewart but I'd like a scan of the Jack Daniels, oh heck forget the scan I'll take the Jack Daniels.
